Public Class ImageMap Inherits Image Implements IPostBackEventHandler

type ImageMap = class inherit Image interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 创建在页面上显示图像的控件。

span.span: Creates a control that displays an image on a page.

summary.span: 单击在 控件内定义的作用点区域时，该控件生成到服务器的回发或导航到指定的 URL。

span.span: When a hot spot region defined within the control is clicked, the control either generates a postback to the server or navigates to a specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件来创建映像，其中包含定义的作用点区域。Use the control to create an image that contains defined hot spot regions. 当用户单击作用点区域时，该控件可以生成回发到服务器或者导航到指定的 URL。When a user clicks a hot spot region, the control can either generate a postback to the server or navigate to a specified URL. 例如，可以使用此控件显示的地理区域映射。For example, you can use this control to display a map of a geographical region. 当用户单击地图上的特定区域时，该控件导航到提供有关所选区域的其他数据的 URL。When a user clicks a specific region on the map, the control navigates to a URL that provides additional data about the selected region. 此外可以使用此控件为生成回发到服务器并运行基于被单击的作用点区域的特定代码。You can also use this control to generate a postback to the server and run specific code based on the hot spot region that was clicked. 例如，可以使用用于捕获用户响应如投票控件。For example, you can use an control to capture user responses such as votes. 当用户单击是投票为定义的作用点区域时，调用代码来记录在数据库中的是响应。When a user clicks the hot spot region defined for yes votes, code is called to record a yes response in a database. 当用户单击定义的投票的作用点区域时，记录没有响应。When a user clicks on the hot spot region defined for no votes, a no response is recorded. 您还可以混合使用这两种方案在单个控件。You can also mix these two scenarios within a single control. 例如，可以指定一个作用点区域以导航到的 URL 和要回发到服务器的另一个作用点区域。For example, you can specify one hot spot region to navigate to a URL and another hot spot region to post back to the server. 使用属性来指定要显示的图像的路径控件。Use the property to specify the path to the image to display for the control. 可以定义任意数量的中的对象控件。You can define any number of objects within an control. 可以使用， ，和类定义的作用点区域。You can use the , , and classes to define hot spot regions. 或者，可以派生自抽象类定义你自己的自定义的作用点对象。Alternatively, you can derive from the abstract class to define your own custom hot spot object. 有两种方法，以指定的行为中的对象控制何时单击。There are two ways to specify the behavior of a object in an control when the is clicked. 你可以使用上的属性控制或对单个属性对象。You can use either the property on the control or the property on an individual object. 使用其中一个设置这些属性枚举值。These properties are set using one of the enumeration values. 如果设置了这两个属性，指定对每个属性对象将优先于属性控件。If both properties are set, the property specified on each individual object takes precedence over the property on the control. 若要导航到的 URL，设置属性或属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。To navigate to a URL, set either the property or the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. 使用属性来指定要导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要生成的回发到服务器，设置属性或属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Postback`。To generate a postback to the server, set either the property or the property to `HotSpotMode.Postback`. 使用属性来指定作用点区域的名称。Use the property to specify a name for the hot spot region. 此名称将传递在回发事件发生时的事件数据。This name will be passed in the event data when a postback event occurs. 当回发单击时，引发事件。When a postback is clicked, the event is raised. 以编程方式控制时执行的操作回发是单击，提供的事件处理程序事件。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 若要使所有中的对象控件具有相同的行为，请使用属性以指定的行为。To cause all objects in an control to have the same behavior, use the property to specify the behavior. 然后，设置对每个属性对象传递给`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或未指定的值属性。Then, either set the property on each individual object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the property. 若要指定不同的行为中的对象，请设置对每个属性为对象`HotSpotMode.Navigate`或`HotSpotMode.PostBack`。To specify different behaviors for objects in an , set the property on each individual object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate` or `HotSpotMode.PostBack`. > [!NOTE] > 如果控件的属性或上的任何属性它所包含的对象设置为`HotSpotMode.NotSet`默认情况下的行为是未设置为一个值，或`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。If an control's property or the property on any of the objects it contains is set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or is not set to a value, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                        ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个控件对象。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Navigate`，这导致页后，可以导航到指定的 URL 每次用户单击一个圆形作用点区域。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, which causes the page to navigate to the specified URL each time a user clicks one of the circle hot spot regions. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供你自己的映像是否属性并更新路径到映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass1/CS/imagemapclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass1/VB/imagemapclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个控件对象。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，表示将页回发到服务器每次用户单击作用点区域之一。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供你自己的映像是否属性并更新路径到映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件，其中包含与不同的行为的热点。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains hot spots with different behaviors. 背景区域被定义为单个回发到服务器。The background area is a defined as a single that posts back to the server. 三个对象定义的同一区域中。Three objects are defined in the same region. 每个这些热点看起来像按钮并导航到的 URL。Each of these hot spots looks like a button and navigates to a URL. 当两个作用点重叠，声明的热点首先具有优先级的区域中单击控件。When an control is clicked in a region where two hot spots overlap, the hot spot that is declared first has precedence. 在此示例中，首先声明按钮作用点和最后声明包含其背景作用点。In this example, the button hot spots are declared first and the background hot spot that contains them is declared last. 因此，用户可以通过按钮的行为对象，不是背景对象，当用户单击按钮作用点。Therefore, the user gets the behavior of the button object, not the background object, when the user clicks a button hot spot. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供你自己的映像是否属性并更新路径到映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass3/CS/imagemapclass3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass3/VB/imagemapclass3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 单击 控件的 对象时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a object in an control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时对象中单击控件。The event is raised when a object in an control is clicked. 若要允许引发事件，必须首先设置上的属性控件或属性对象传递给`HotSpotMode.Postback`。To allow a to raise the event, you must first set either the property on the control or the property on the object to `HotSpotMode.Postback`. 以编程方式控制时执行的操作回发是单击，提供的事件处理程序事件，其中包含要运行时引发该事件的代码。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event that contains the code to run when the event is raised. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建包含两个控件对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，表示将页回发到服务器每次用户单击作用点区域之一。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. `VoteMap_Clicked`事件处理程序处理的 click 事件控件。The `VoteMap_Clicked` event handler handles the click event for the control. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供你自己的映像是否属性并更新路径到映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)]

Public Overridable Property HotSpotMode As HotSpotMode

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 对象时 控件的 对象的默认行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the default behavior for the objects of an control when the objects are clicked.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定默认的单击的行为中的对象控件。Use the property to specify the default click behavior of the objects within an control. 此属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |项Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Inactive`|对象不具有任何行为。The object does not have any behavior.| |`NotSet`|对象使用设置的行为控件的属性。The object uses the behavior set by the control's property. 如果控件不定义行为，对象将导航到的 URL。If the control does not define the behavior, the objects all navigate to a URL.| |`Navigate`|对象导航到的 URL。The objects navigate to a URL.| |`PostBack`|对象生成的回发到服务器。The objects generate a postback to the server.| 您可以指定使用的对象的行为的属性控件或属性的每个单独对象。You can specify a object's behavior using either the property of the control or the property of each individual object. 如果设置了这两个属性，指定对每个属性对象将优先于属性控件。If both properties are set, the property specified on each individual object takes precedence over the property on the control. 当您将设置的属性控件，请注意，`HotSpotMode.NotSet`和`HotSpotMode.Navigate`值具有相同的行为： 同时定位到的 URL。When you set the property of the control, note that the `HotSpotMode.NotSet` and `HotSpotMode.Navigate` values have the same behavior: both navigate to a URL. 指定时`HotSpotMode.NotSet`有关个人属性对象，确定的值从其行为属性控件。When you specify `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for the property of an individual object, that determines its behavior from the value of the property of the control. 如果指定`HotSpotMode.Navigate`有关属性，页面会导航到 URL 时单击。If you specify `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for the property, the page navigates to a URL when the is clicked. 使用属性来指定要导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 如果指定`HotSpotMode.PostBack`有关属性，页面生成的回发到服务器时单击。If you specify `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for the property, the page generates a postback to the server when the is clicked. 使用属性指定的作用点区域的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the hot spot region. 此名称将传递在回发事件发生时的事件数据。This name will be passed in the event data when a postback event occurs. 当回发单击时，引发事件。When a postback is clicked, the event is raised. 以编程方式控制时执行的操作回发是单击，提供的事件处理程序事件。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 如果指定`HotSpotMode.Inactive`有关属性，单击时，对象不具有任何行为。If you specify `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for the property, the object does not have any behavior when it is clicked. 此值可用于创建更大的活动作用点内处于非活动状态的作用点。You can use this value to create an inactive hot spot within a larger active hot spot. 此选项，以便您可以创建更复杂的作用点区域内控件。This option is provided to allow you to create more complex hot spot zones within an control. 若要创建活动的作用点内的某个非活动区域，必须指定在活动的作用点之前处于非活动状态的作用点控件。To create an inactive area within an active hot spot, you must specify the inactive hot spot before the active hot spot in the control. 例如，以下通过指定非活动状态的圆形作用点内较大 active 圆形作用点，定义一个活动的环：For example, the following defines an active ring by specifying an inactive circular hot spot within a larger active circular hot spot: ``` ``` 若要使所有中的对象控件具有相同的行为，请使用属性控件以指定的行为。To cause all objects in an control to have the same behavior, use the property on the control to specify the behavior. 然后，设置对每个属性对象传递给`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或未指定的值属性。Then, either set the property on each individual object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the property. 若要指定不同的行为中的对象控件，将设置对每个属性为对象`HotSpotMode.Navigate`， `HotSpotMode.PostBack`，或`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。To specify different behaviors for objects in an control, set the property on each individual object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, or `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. > [!NOTE] > 如果控件的属性或上的任何属性它所包含的对象被设置为`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或者未设置为一个值，默认情况下的行为是`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。If an control's property or the property on any of the objects it contains is either set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or not set to a value, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个控件对象。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，表示将页回发到服务器每次用户单击作用点区域之一。The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 属性不为每个设置对象，因为它们获取从其行为属性。The property is not set on each of the objects because they get their behavior from the property. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供你自己的映像是否属性并更新路径到映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMap.HotSpotMode1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.HotSpotMode1/CS/imagemap.hotspotmode1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMap.HotSpotMode1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.HotSpotMode1/VB/imagemap.hotspotmode1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中定义的作用点区域。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represents the defined hot spot regions in an control.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示 控件中定义的作用点区域。

span.span: A object that represents the defined hot spot regions in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式管理中的作用点区域控件。Use the property to programmatically manage the hot spot regions in an control. 可以使用属性来添加、 插入、 删除和检索对象。You can use the property to add, insert, remove, and retrieve objects. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建控件，并添加两个到它的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create an control and add two objects to it. 属性来访问有关控件，并添加到它的对象。The property is used to access the for the control and add the objects to it. 对于此示例中正常工作，您必须提供你自己的映像是否属性并更新路径到映像相应地，以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMap.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.Cstr/CS/imagemap.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMap.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMap.Cstr/VB/imagemap.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从 方法保存的上一个页请求还原 控件的视图状态信息。

span.span: Restores view-state information for the control from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

span.span: is not a valid .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnClick (System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnClick(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnClick (e As ImageMapEventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnClick(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ImageMapEventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnClick : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs -> unit override this.OnClick : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 类型的参数。

span.span: An argument of type that contains the event data.

summary.span: 为 控件引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时对象中单击控件。The event is raised when a object in an control is clicked. 若要允许引发事件，必须首先设置上的属性控件或属性对象传递给`HotSpotMode.Postback`。To allow a to raise the event, you must first set either the property on the control or the property on the object to `HotSpotMode.Postback`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Raises events for the control when a form is posted back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页的值传递`eventArgument`参数方法的控件。The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the method of the control. 将引发事件被单击的对象。The raises a event for the object that was clicked.

para.span: 若要处理的派生类中的单击事件，请重写方法。

span.span: To handle a click event in a derived class, override the method.

span.span: Sends the control content to the specified object, which writes the content to render on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 当开发自定义服务器控件派生自控件，您可以重写此方法以生成的内容。When developing a custom server control derived from the control, you can override this method to generate content for the .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override object SaveViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveViewState () As Object
protected: override System::Object ^ SaveViewState();
override this.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后发生的任何 控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any changes to an control's view-state that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 返回 控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是累积的服务器控件的属性的值。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后将保留到字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象返回到客户端为存储在变量`Hidden`HTML 元素。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an `Hidden` HTML element. 当你创作的自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的提高效率`ViewState`属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

related.span: ImageMap Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: ImageMap Web Server Control Overview

span.span: The argument for the event.

summary.span: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 。

span.span: For a description of this member, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应使用方法来引发的事件控制窗体发布回服务器时。Typically, you should use the method to raise an event for the control when a form is posted back to the server. 方法是显式接口成员实现。The method is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定义用于引发该事件的自定义实现对象，请重写成员。

span.span: To define a custom implementation for raising the event for a object, override the member.

para.span: 显式接口实现调用方法来引发事件时发送的数据已更改的控件。

span.span: The explicit interface implementation calls the method to raise the event when posted data has changed for the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件时显示链接到的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame that displays the Web page content linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时，显示指定网页的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame that displays the specified Web page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 值必须以 A 到 Z 的字母（不区分大小写）开头，但下列以下划线开头的特殊值除外：

span.span: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore:

description.span: 将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。

span.span: Renders the content in a new window without frames.

description.span: 将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。

span.span: Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.

description.span: 在搜索窗格中呈现内容。

span.span: Renders the content in the search pane.

description.span: 将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。

span.span: Renders the content in the frame with focus.

description.span: 将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。

span.span: Renders the content in the full window without frames.

para.span: 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 值。

span.span: Check your browser documentation to determine if the value is supported.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 目标值。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the target value.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的框架或窗口，其中显示网页 r 时单击控件。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page r when the control is clicked. 通过设置指定 Web 页属性。The Web page is specified by setting the property. 使用属性时的值属性是`HotSpotMode.Navigate`; 忽略它时的值属性是`HotSpotMode.PostBack`。The property is used when the value of the property is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`; it is ignored when the value of the property is `HotSpotMode.PostBack`. 如果属性未设置，则浏览器或窗口具有焦点时刷新单击控件。If the property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性将呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`特性，可以在`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许元素。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1 符合。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在创建可访问网页时，强烈建议您不要使用属性将另一个窗口作为目标。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended that you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)并[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

span.span: Tracks view-state changes to the control so they can be stored in the control's object.

span.span: This object is accessible through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 ASP.NET 自动调用此方法时控件进行初始化。This method is called automatically by ASP.NET when the control is initialized.
